meanings.definition: A movie or film that features nudity or sexual content.
meanings.sent1: I watched a skinflick with my friends last night.
meanings.sent2: The skinflick we saw at the theater was quite explicit.
meanings.sent3: The skinflick we watched had a lot of naked people in it!
meanings.sent4: The skinflick was like a window into a different world of sensuality.
meanings.sent5: The skinflick left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: To watch or produce a skinflick.
meanings.sent1: Let's skinflick tonight and have a movie marathon.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys skinflicking on weekends for entertainment.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe he chose to skinflick instead of going out with us!
meanings.sent4: Skinflicking allows you to explore different genres of cinema.
meanings.sent5: He decided to skinflick all day to relax and unwind.
